message: You could use the [*already existing* cancellation support](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.net.sockets.sockettaskextensions.receiveasync?view=net-5.0#System_Net_Sockets_SocketTaskExtensions_ReceiveAsync_System_Net_Sockets_Socket_System_Memory_System_Byte__System_Net_Sockets_SocketFlags_System_Threading_CancellationToken_), but you can't *add* cancellation using something like `WaitWithCancellation`. This is because that kind of approach actually just cancels the *wait* - the *read* is still ongoing.
